tooltip.label.gem: Throw into Wishing Wells, use to recharge Charms, or use to upgrade Adornments
tooltip.label.pouch: Holds small valuables - coins, gems, charms, etc.
tooltip.charmable.usage: Hold in hand or bind to adornment for buffs
tooltip.charmable.usage.adornment: Hold in hand or equip for buffs
tooltip.runestones.usage: Combine with adornment on anvil for enchancements
tooltip.charm_book.usage: Use to imbue charm onto charmables.
tooltip.charm.rate.drain: drains 0.5 hearts/5 sec from all in %s block radius
tooltip.charm.rate.reflection: reflects %s%% damage to all in %s block radius
runestone.treasure2:anvil_rune.name: Rune of the Anvil
runestone.treasure2:mana_rune.name: Rune of Mana
runestone.treasure2:durability_rune.name: Rune of Durability
runestone.treasure2:quality_rune.name: Rune of Quality
runestone.treasure2:equip_mana_rune.name: Rune of Equipment Mana
runestone.treasure2:angels_rune.name: Angel Blessed Rune
runestone.treasure2:sockets_rune.name: Rune of Capacity
tooltip.runestones.title: Runestones:
tooltip.runestone.lore.anvil_rune: Adds Infinite durability to the adornment.
tooltip.runestone.lore.quality_rune: Adds 25% effect (damange, healing, etc) to all charms.
tooltip.runestone.lore.equip_mana_rune: Reduces random armor/equipment durability at 2x cost instead of mana.
tooltip.runestone.lore.angels_rune: Adds 2x mana to all Healing and Shielding charms.\nAdds Infinite durability.
tooltip.runestone.lore.persistence_rune: Removes Curse of Vanishing from adornment.
tooltip.runestone.lore.sockets_rune: Adds an extra charm socket slot to the adornment.
tooltip.jeweler_bench.usage1: Place adornment and gem in first row to upgrade the adornment.
tooltip.jeweler_bench.usage2: Place adornment in second row to destroy gem and keep adornment.
tooltip.jeweler_bench.usage3: Place adornment in third row to destroy adornment and  keep gem.
tooltip.jeweler_bench.note: You may lose charms if the adornments' new max level is less than the current charms.
tooltip.charming_table.usage: Used to modify charms and runes on adornments.
tooltip.charming_table.usage1: Place adornment and charm/runestone in first row to add to the adornment.
tooltip.charming_table.usage2: Place treasure tool in any row with charm/rune to remove charm/runes from adornment.
tooltip.charming_table.usage3: Place valid gem/item in any charm row to recharge gem if allowable.
tooltip.charming_table.note: You may lose charms if certain runes are removed (ex. Rune of Charm Capacity).
display.jeweler_bench.name: Jeweler's Bench
display.charming_table.name: Charming Table
